name: Physical Therapy
description: It is one of the major service which I provide.Your personal physical therapy begins with a comprehensive evaluation of functional limitations and areas of pain.

name: Chiropractic Therapy
description: Chiropractic is a non-invasive, hands-on health care discipline that focuses on the neuro-musculoskeletal system. Chiropractors practice a manual approach.

name: Massage Therapy
description: Massage therapy is a hands-on treatment that involves manipulation of the soft tissue structures of the body to prevent and alleviate pain.
